CTRAVL@tokencreate.name: Travel Deals
CTRAVL@tokencreate.description: Crypto Travel Deals is a global, crypto-only, travel portal built on the XPR Network blockchain. No gas fees, discounts for stakers, and affiliate income!

ARK@arcana.name: Noah's Ark
ARK@arcana.description: Arcana is a private market maker service designed not for individual use but to serve bots that capitalize on arbitrage opportunities by utilizing liquidity from our extensive pools across all major coins on the XPR network. Our services help traders navigate the vast inflows and outflows of liquidity, creating minor disturbances within our private pools to stabilize the broader market and potentially the entire financial system, thanks to the significant collection of tokens and ARK pools on XPR. The ARK token enables market makers to build liquidity and is not intended to increase in price. NOAH provides rewards to ARK pools, enhancing our ability to monitor liquidity. Like ARK, NOAH is not designed to appreciate in value. DOVE, awarded to reward NOAH pools, also carries no expectation of price increase. In addition to supplying essential liquidity to underserved markets, a spot market offers targeted liquidity for bots to engage in trading. IMPORTANT: As a private service not intended for human users or investors, we advise against holding any of our tokens. The strategic nature of our service to bots requires us to open and maintain precise liquidity levels in open markets, but we do not offer these tokens to the general public. We have no website and are not a publicly disclosed project, the link is one charity we hope to support qith any profits. All profits are hereby perpetually given as a religious offering to the Lyran civilization and/or donated to reconstruct the Ark.

HALF@halfhalf.name: HALF
HALF@halfhalf.description: ü•õ HALF is a refreshingly simple project. HALF brings strong bones to stables, and creme to stakers, splitting the bag 50-50. ü•õ Half (50%) of spot market sales goes to Alcor LP farming rewards as cold refreshing XUSDC. The rest goes towards stabilizing stable coins, the forgotten key to making XPR Network attractive to the wider crypto community. Here's how it works. üõ† The token contract receives all the sales from the HALF / XUSDC spot market on Alcor. Anyone can call the 'halftime' action on the 'halfhalf' token contract to automatically add rewards to the HALF / XUSDC farm on Alcor, sending half (50%) of the spot market proceeds in USDC. The remaining 50% goes towards stabilizing XMD, XUSDT and XUSDC. An account called 2apes puts a +/- 3% spread on the XUSDT / XUSDC spot market and uses liquidity pools to stabilize the XMD / XUSDC, XMD / XUSDT, and XUSDT / XUSDC pairs at +/- 2%. But will team dump?? There are no Team tokens, you can verify that, and we don't need them to get paid because we drink our milkshake by stabilizing the stable coins. Over 99.9% of supply of HALF has been burned. That's a tactic we use to remain visible as one of the highest value projects by market cap. Remaining HALF tokens are listed on the Alcor spot market from $100 to $10,000, 100X the initial price. By staking HALF, you are signaling that you care that your community gets richly rewarded, and you believe in a bright future for XPR Network. ‚ÑπÔ∏è Important Information: Half is a novel and noble experiment in tokenomics. All XUSDC moved to the stabilization account is considered a donation, and any proceeds from the stabilization, including the initial donation, may be used for any purpose the creators see fit, including supporting other projects. Shit happens, so HALF presents risk of loss up to purchase amount. We are not soliciting you to buy this token, in this or any communication. We aren't telling you HALF will make you money, or promising any outcome. HALF is a private project, and does not represent alcor.exchange or XPR Network. Make your own decisions, and always DYOR. Enjoy ‚òïÔ∏è
